analysis.description:
Peculium.UpgradeTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x3618516f45cd3c913f81f9987af41077932bc40d.sol#287-305) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-peculOld.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amountChanged) (/unique_chucks/2/0x3618516f45cd3c913f81f9987af41077932bc40d.sol#294-299)

Reentrancy in Peculium.UpgradeTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x3618516f45cd3c913f81f9987af41077932bc40d.sol#287-305):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(peculOld.totalSupply() > 0) (/unique_chucks/2/0x3618516f45cd3c913f81f9987af41077932bc40d.sol#292-293)
	- amountChanged = peculOld.allowance(msg.sender,address(this)) (/unique_chucks/2/0x3618516f45cd3c913f81f9987af41077932bc40d.sol#293-294)
	- peculOld.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amountChanged) (/unique_chucks/2/0x3618516f45cd3c913f81f9987af41077932bc40d.sol#294-299)
	- peculOld.burn(amountChanged) (/unique_chucks/2/0x3618516f45cd3c913f81f9987af41077932bc40d.sol#299)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/2/0x3618516f45cd3c913f81f9987af41077932bc40d.sol#301-302)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/2/0x3618516f45cd3c913f81f9987af41077932bc40d.sol#302)
